fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a Full Moon, kill and clean your target
- During a New Moon, get investigator results of your target

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- You have a night chat with other Weres
- Investigation results are shared with other Weres.
